snippet: Richard Chai's fall 2012 collection was predominantly based in urban shades of grays, blacks and navy blue.
abstract: Richard Chai's fall 2012 collection was predominantly based in urban shades of grays, blacks and navy blue.
lead_paragraph: Richard Chai's collection was late arriving at Lincoln Center for his 11 a.m. fashion show this morning, so while the editors were waiting, they checked their e-mail. At 11:12 a.m., a press release popped in my in-box from Pantone, the color forecasting company, announcing its predictions for the fall season: Olympian Blue, Tangerine Tango, Ultramarine Green, Titanium, Honey Gold, Pink Flambé and other colors that I can't quite picture but assume to be rather bright.
